definition: definitely/absolutely (not)/(scoffing or dismissive interjection) Yeah, right./Tut!/to grind/close to/eager/to correspond to/see also 反切[fan3 qie4]

sentences.english: Make a cut in the shape of a cross in the bag with a cutter flamed .

sentences.english: They are able to cut through metal and are nearly impossible to destroy.

sentences.english: However, their cutters can be twice as expensive as the Easy Cutter.

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a rubber belt box with a cutting knife, which belongs to the daily necessaries.

sentences.english: This machine is designed for cutting belts of natural rubber and other plastic materials.
sentences.chinese: 本機適用於切割天然膠塊和其它各種塑性材料。

sentences.english: I've also learned to control my pressure using a sharper edge scribing tool .

definition: to peel/to strip/to peel off/to come off (of tissue, skin, covering etc)
